casebody.data:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0297. U.S. Bank, N.A. v. Cooper.

Medina App. No. 12CA0084-M, 2014-Ohio-61. On review of order certifying a conflict. The court determines that a conflict exists. Sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 2013-0304, Bank of Am., N.A. v. Kuchta, 9th Dist. Medina No. 12CA0025-M, 2012-Ohio-5562; and briefing schedule stayed.

Pfeifer and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent.
